fields.name: reason
fields.description: The field for the reason record component.

fields.name: report
fields.description: The field for the report record component.

fields.name: bugReportLink
fields.description: The field for the bugReportLink record component.

constructors.name: DisconnectionDetails
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a DisconnectionDetails record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: reason
methods.description: Returns the value of the reason record component.

methods.name: report
methods.description: Returns the value of the report record component.

methods.name: bugReportLink
methods.description: Returns the value of the bugReportLink record component.
